review:
Unlike all other doctors whom we consulted for our new born baby, Dr Rajesh more inclined towards natural healing and emphasized more on infant's comfort* ** ******* *********  *** *********** ***** ***** ** ************ As a 
father I am pretty satisfied with his approach towards treating patient. I highly recommend others parents for visiting Dr Rajesh.

I have been taking my 3 year old daughter for past 2 years  for Vaccinations to Dr Rajesh only. I would say his way of treating and caring for his patients is still the same. I recommend him to other  parents like me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We love Little Stars. All the doctors that work there are friendly and give ample time to every patient. All the kids in our family go to this hospital.

Doctor is very calm going. But dealing with the management is the most pathetic experience.  They doesn't respond to the patients quickly and doesn't report to doctor about patient on time. They even doesn't give the Video consultation slot quickly even though they have that option.please don't visit this Hospital until you have lot of free time and no emergency
